alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Lunenburg; Nottoway (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 2:28PM EDT until July 16 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Lunenburg County in south central Virginia... Southeastern Nottoway County in south central Virginia... Northwestern Brunswick County in south central Virginia... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 228 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kenbridge, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Dundas around 240 PM EDT. Blackstone and Fort Pickett around 315 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lafoon Corner, Danieltown, Irby, Barrows Store, Murdocks, Forkland, Blackstone Airport and Dominy Corner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
